message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great product for a price of $9,500. I believe this product will be very valuable to you.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested, but $9,500 is a bit steep for me.  I'd be willing to pay $8,500 for the product.  What do you think?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm looking for a price closer to $9,000.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $8,750?
